name: DOWN (Coding Wizard Games)
description:
Down beneath the earth you traverse dangerous caves, fight deadly beasts, and climb perilous cliffs in search of more. Your curiosity beckons you...

DOWN Is a procedurally generated arcade style cave exploration game where the goal is to simply wander through a massive procedurally cave system, but it's not all fun and games (well it is actually), there are dangerous creatures everywhere, massive pits, and mysteriously placed torches.

DOWN was originally a small test to see if I could make procedurally generated terrain but after a while it became a game, and at that point I just had to finish it. I know it's small and relatively bad but like I said it was just a test. I hope you have fun playing it and good luck.

NOTE: Windows and Mac versions are UNTESTED and may, bug or have troubles running.

Please tell me any bugs in the comment section.
